posts.subject: Soft board
posts.body: This is the 8ch backup board for Gift brand Fumofumos. Post cute pictures of plushies from Touhou Project, Project Diva, and other Japanese brands. Violent imagery and abuse of any kind towards plushies is not tolerated. Have a soft day!

posts.subject: Clearnet links for buying plushies
posts.body:
Please read this before posting: http://www.buyfags.moe/Full_guide

Places to buy fumos and other plushes:

Gift:
http://giftshop.jz.shopserve.jp/

Amiami:
http://slist.amiami.com/top/search/list?s_keywords=Touhou+plush&pagemax=15

Buyee/Yahoo Auction Japan:
http://buyee.jp/item/search?query=ふもふも

Tokyo Otaku Mode:
https://otakumode.com/search?mode=shop&category=&keyword=Touhou+plushie

Solaris Japan:
http://solarisjapan.com/search?q=Touhou+plush

Amazon:
http://www.amazon.com/s/ref=bl_dp_s_web_165793011?ie=UTF8&node=165793011&field-brandtextbin=touhou

suruga-ya:
http://www.suruga-ya.jp/search?category=5&search_word=%E3%81%B5%E3%82%82%E3%81%B5%E3%82%82

Proxy and Forwarding services:
http://buyfags.moe/Special_services

IRC channel is #/fumo/ on irc.rizon.net
Join using your favorite IRC client and chat with us!

Additional Boards:
https://chiru.no/fumos
https://boards.4chan.org/jp/fumo

Steam group for supplemental discussion:
http://steamcommunity.com/groups/jpfumo
every once in a while you will see one on buyee, but no guarentees

>>cac598fc-b4b9-4413-87ff-65c3e9c7746c
yeah, don't expect to find them cheap if they do show. I was lucky and found marisa for $490 and took it as soon as I could. You won't see a good deal like that everyday.
My W541 is the most powerful thinkpad I own. Loaded with a i7-4940Xm, 16gb ram, and k2100m, I can tackle compiling like a champ running at 4ghz.
